title: Pennsylvania GOP House Leader Blessed Larry Krasner Impeachment Vote After Heated Caucus Meeting
description:
Right-wing Republicans in the state House, who have been threatening Kerry Benninghoff’s leadership, demanded a lame-duck vote in a caucus meeting.

The post Pennsylvania GOP House Leader Blessed Larry Krasner Impeachment Vote After Heated Caucus Meeting appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Staring Down the Death Chamber at 76, Murray Hooper Still Says He’s Innocent
description:
Some of his co-defendants were exonerated. Others died behind bars. Of four death sentences, only Hooper’s remains. Now he’s up for execution.

The post Staring Down the Death Chamber at 76, Murray Hooper Still Says He’s Innocent appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Public Has Never Seen the U.S. Government Force-Feed Someone — Until Now
description:
In an exclusive video, a hunger striker is force-fed in ICE detention — lifting the veil of secrecy on a practice condemned by medical ethicists.

The post The Public Has Never Seen the U.S. Government Force-Feed Someone — Until Now appeared first on The Intercept.
